short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically wipes browsing data on close. Nothing more, Nothing less

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Self-destructing history and browsing data" is an extension that gives you the ability to wipe your browsing data once chrome closes.

You can chose what you want to clear from your browsing data in the extension's option page.

This software is open source and is released under the MIT licence. You can find the code here: https://gitlab.com/Hailtothebreak/Self-destructing-history-and-browsing-data

If you have any questions or bugs that you would like to submit you can reach me here at: hailtothebreak@outlook.com

Tested on the following:
Chromium/Linux
Chrome/Windows 8.1
